1.title: Iconic
1.plot: Let me introduce you to the SNI Universe. But before we jump into things you should meet two of it's very important characters Malique Harris the boy with amnesia who can only remember the past six months and local superhero Ghost: The Dreadheaded Ninja.

2.title: Passion Over Pain
2.plot: Ghost heads to meet a friend from his childhood named Kevin but is side tracked when he runs into Deathstroke. Meanwhile Tohopka aka: Mack is still getting a feel for their new roommate.

3.title: Alpha Blood
3.plot: After being attacked by Hanzo while leaving comic-con Ghost finally makes his way home. Meanwhile Mack meets one of his new roommates friends who has made himself all to comfy and were finally introduced to the mysterious man Ghost has been in pursuit of "Alpha Moe"

4.title: Passion over pain
4.plot: Ghost and Tohopka find themselves in a pickle after new roommate Gilton walks in on their everyday behavior. Meanwhile "Nina" star of the award winning short film "Sidekick" is reintroduced into the story with a whole new outlook on life and a whole new set of problems as she settles back into reality . But this time Ghost and Tohopka aren't there to save the day.

imdb.plot outline: After waking with amnesia of the past 20 years of life Malique Harris/Ghost aka "The DreadHeaded Ninja" is found by "Tohopka" A member of the Navajo Nation who was banished and set out on a quest to find a legendary lost hero. Only problem is, the one he's found isn't as heroic as the legends brought him to believe. As they attempt to get back to reality as their normal alias's Malique and Mackie they must also deal with ordinary life struggles including finances, time management and personal life while simultaneously helping Ghost recover the rest of his memories prior to the past year. Of coarse nothing is ever that easy. In the midst of trying to fit in Ghost and Tohopka must also deal with untapped supernatural abilities, demons created from their past mistakes, and crossing paths with a number of other characters who have been greatly affected by their life choices or who will affect their life in ways they couldn't have possibly imagined. Witness the birth of the SNI Universe.
imdb.title: SNI Universe: The Series
